cmp: 句 ((a measure word, for sentences or lines of verse)/sentence)

exm.mng: lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others, pour encourager les autres
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others, pour encourager les autres
lit. punish one, warn one hundred (idiom), fig. to make an example of sb
in order to warn against following bad examples (idiom), as a warning to others
